channel.title: admin on bretsw
channel.description: Recent content in admin on bretsw

item.description: Hey there, I’m Bret. Read my CV or download I am a PhD candidate in the Educational Psychology & Educational Technology program at Michigan State University. My research focuses on networked teacher learning—specifically, how social media platforms can support professional learning and induction in the process of K-20 educators becoming teachers. This work is interdisciplinary and utilizes a variety of methods—both human and computational—including qualitative content analysis, social network analysis, and machine learning.
